FOUND IN: Zip (related to zippers, but can refer to the idea of fastening itself)
Across: At last, on the flip side
Lighter aquatic vehicle designed for specific shallow environments
Canoe: A narrow, lightweight boat typically propelled by a single person using a double-bladed paddle.
Nine-digit number: A numerical representation consisting of nine digits, typically used for identification or storage purposes (e.g., Social Security numbers).
